alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Hardeman (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:12PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Crockett, northeastern Hardeman, Madison and west central Chester Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 511 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mercer, or 12 miles southwest of Jackson, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Chickasaw State Forest, Chickasaw State Park, Fairview, Three Way, Bemis, Adair, Mercer, Carroll, Medon, Neely, Pinson, Huntersville, Westover, Madison Hall, Uptonville, Gilmore, Teague, Maple Grove and Leighton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for west Tennessee.
